code.title: Code Samples and Snippets
code.description: Every single code sample and snippet that is discussed in the book, and then _a few more_, which didn't make it into the book.

speed-matters.title: Speed Still Matters
speed-matters.description: In this blog post, renowned Jeff Atwood, of [Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com "Stack Overflow Q&A Site") fame, goes over anecdotes about how Google and Amazon tested their sites' perceived speed, and the interesting conclusions they arrived at.

grunt.title: Grunt Task Runner
grunt.description: Grunt is a task runner that helps us automate our build process. It is thoroughly discussed in the book.

db-tasks.title: Case Study: Database Tasks
db-tasks.description: In this particular code sample, we'll create a series of database-related tasks for our build process. These will help us bootstrap environments, as well as reduce the complexity in database schema updates and rollbacks.

secure-config.title: RSA Secure Configuration
secure-config.description: Chapter 3 is all about environments in general and the development environment in particular. In this example, we'll learn how to keep our configuration safe by encrypting it with an RSA key. Full details are available following the link.
